// react plugin used to create charts import { Bar } from "react-chartjs-2"; import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Card, CardHeader, Col, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, Table, Container, Row, FormGroup, Form, Input, CardBody, Button, } from "reactstrap"; import { chartOptions, parseOptions, chartExample2 } from "variables/charts.js"; // core components import Header from "components/Headers/Header.js"; const Pushdown = () => { let [value, setValue] = useState(""); const [tableName, setTableName] = useState(""); const [whereClause, setWhereClause] = useState(""); const [columnName, setColumnName] = useState(""); const [orderBy, setOrderBy] = useState(""); const [groupBy, setGroupBy] = useState(""); const inputRef = useRef(); const handleInputValue = () => { const queryParts = []; if (tableName) queryParts.push(`Table=${tableName}`); if (whereClause) queryParts.push(`Where=${whereClause}`); if (columnName) queryParts.push(`Column=${columnName}`); if (orderBy) queryParts.push(`OrderBy=${orderBy}`); if (groupBy) queryParts.push(`GroupBy=${groupBy}`); const query = queryParts.join("&"); inputRef.current.value = query; }; const [source, setSource] = useState("/img/TPC-H 1.png"); const changeImage = (value) => { setSource("/img/" + value + ".png"); }; const handleDropdownClick = (e) => { const value = e.target.getAttribute("value"); setQuery(value); changeImage(value); }; if (window.Chart) { parseOptions(Chart, chartOptions()); } return ( <>
